bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Package wasn't retired after using "fedpkg retire".
[dan@eagle neso]$ fedpkg retire "retired by upstream" Your git configuration does not use a namespace. Consider updating your git configuration by running: git remote set-url origin ssh://sharkcz@pkgs.fedoraproject.org/rpms/neso rm '.gitignore' rm 'neso.spec' rm 'sources' [master 9ec456f] retired by upstream 4 files changed, 1 insertion(+), 113 deletions(-) delete mode 100644 .gitignore create mode 100644 dead.package delete mode 100644 neso.spec delete mode 100644 sources Could not retire package: No spec file found. This package is retired
at that point I had to manually push the git commit and nothing changed in pkgdb web UI
so I did manually [dan@eagle neso]$ pkgdb-cli orphan --retire neso master FAS password for user sharkcz: user: sharkcz updated package: neso status from: Approved to Retired on branch: master
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): fedpkg-1.24-2.fc24
